channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Biden’s Diagnosis Exposes a Critical Weakness in Our Political System
item.description: We don’t know enough about the health of the people who want to lead us.

item.title: DOJ Can Dig Up Even More Evidence U.S. Taxpayers Funded Lab Creation Of Covid-19
item.description: The closest point of access that we have to the Wuhan lab is Dr. Peter Daszak. DOJ needs to start asking him questions.

item.title: Supreme Court: President Can Fire Federal Executives Without Cause
item.description: It seems logical that a president can root out people likely to work against him and appoint people who represent his agenda.

item.title: Trump threatens 25% import tax on Apple unless iPhones are made in the U.S.
item.description: President Trump on Friday threatened to put a 25% tariff on Apple products unless iPhones are manufactured in the United States.

item.title: Trump blasts out bevy of threats against Apple and the EU, saying imported iPhones face a 25% hike
item.description: Writing on Truth Social, President Trump put pressure on both Apple and the EU to get behind his 'America First' policy.

item.title: U.S. Forces Abroad Protect the Homeland
item.description: Forward-deployed military forces impose costs on aggressive adversaries and keep violence as far from America’s shores as possible.
